gurmukhi: jIA mry ibnu j`g n hoeI ] j`g krY pwvY nhI koeI ]12]
transliteration: Jeea Dare Bin(u) Jagg Na Hoee|| Jagg Darai Paavai Nahikoee||12||
translation: There could be no Yajna without the killing of beings and if one performed a Yajna, he availed no merit.12.

gurmukhi: ieh ibiD dIXo sBn aupdysw ] j`g skY ko kr n nrysw ]
transliteration: Eh Bidh(i) Deeyo Sabhan Oupdesaa|| Jagg Sakai Ko Kar Na Daresaa||
translation: The Arhant incarnation, instructed all in way, that no king could perform a Yajna.

gurmukhi: ApMQ pMQ sB logn lwXw ] Drm krm koaU krn n pwXw ]13]
transliteration: Apanth Panth Sabh Logad Laayaa|| Dharam Karam Ko( i)  Karan Na Paayaa||13||
translation: Everyone was put on a wrong path and no one was performing the action of Dharma.13.

gurmukhi: AMin AMin qy hoqu jXo Gwis Gwis qy hoie ]
transliteration: Ann(i) Ann(i) Te Hot(u) Jyo Ghaas(i) Ghaas(i) Te Hoe||
translation: Just as corn is produced from corn, grass from grass;

gurmukhi: qYsy mnuC mnuC qy Avru n krqw koie ]14]
transliteration: Taise Manouchh Manouchh Te Avar(u) Na Kartaa Koe||14||
translation: In the same way the man from man (thus there is no creator-Ishvara).14.

gurmukhi: AYs igAwn sBhUn diRVwXo ] Drm krm koaU krn n pwXo ]
transliteration: Ais Giaan Sabh-hoon Dridaayo|| Dharam Karam Ko( i)  Karan Na Paayo||
translation: Such a knowledge was given to all that none performed the action of Dharma.

gurmukhi: ieh biRq bIc sBo icq dInw ] Asur bMs qw qy BXo CInw ]15]
transliteration: Eh Brit Beech Sabho Chit Deenaa|| Asur Bans Taa Te Bhyo Chheenaa||15||
translation: Everyoneâ€™s mind was absorbed in such things and in this way, the clan of demons became weak.15.

gurmukhi: nwvn dYq n pwvY koeI ] ibnu iesnwn pivqR n hoeI ]
transliteration: Naavan Dait Na Paavai Koee|| Bin(u) Isnaan Pavitra Na Hoee||
translation: Such rules were propagated, that no demon could take a bath now, and without taking bath no one could become pure.

gurmukhi: ibnu pivqR koeI Pury n mMqRw ] inPl Bey qw qY sB jMqRw ]16]
transliteration: Bin(u) Pavitra Koiphure Na Mantraa|| Niphal Bhae Taa Tai Sabh Jantraa||16||
translation: Without becoming pure, no mantra could be recited and this way, all the actions became fruitless.16.

gurmukhi: ds shMsR brK kIA rwjw ] sB jg mo mq AYsu prwjw ]
transliteration: Das Sahansra Barakh Keea Raajaa|| Sabh Jag Mo Mat Ais(u) Paraajaa||
translation: In this way, Arhant ruled for ten thousand years and propagated his religion throughout the world.

gurmukhi: Drm krm sB hI imit gXo ] qw qy CIn Asur kul BXo ]17]
transliteration: Dharam Karam Sabh Himittee Gado|| Taa Te Chheen Asur Kul Bhayo||17||
translation: The actions of Dharma ended in the word and in this way, the clan of demons became weak.17.
